Most users looking through this site will be looing for a way to download records from pH1000s.

= Introduction =

A few methods for record downloading are available for various computer platforms.


= Details =
Methods to perform the various tasks are described here.

http://ph1000dataxfer.googlecode.com/files/dataxfer.jpg

== Windows ==

  * [PCbyethernet Get records from pH1000 by ethernet connection]
  * [PCemail Email records to an interested party]
  * [PCautotasks Setup windows Scheduled Tasks to perform the above functions automatically]


== Unix/Linux ==

  * [Linuxbyethernet Get records from pH1000 by ethernet connection]
  * [Linuxemail Email records to an interested party]
  * [LinuxCrontab Setup Scheduled Tasks in crontab to perform the functions automatically]
